Brown agrees to debate Warren at Kennedy Institute, but with conditions

Senator Scott Brown said he will debate at UMass Boston only if Edward Kennedy's widow stays neutral in the race and MSNBC quits as a sponsor. (Boston Globe)

Terrence Gomes, who led Roxbury Community College for nine years, has retired in the wake of a series of questions about his leadership. (Globe, 6/18/12)
